channel.title: Rakontoj por Esperantujo
channel.description: Rakontoj por Esperantujo is designed specifically for teachers, parents, and community members. It makes 40 stories from the African Storybook available in Esperanto as well as the major national, immigrant and refugee languages of the world, with stories in Arabic, French, German, Italian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Spanish, Tagalog, and Urdu, among others.
